game.title: Interstellar: Pixel Odyssey
game.plot: In 'Interstellar: Pixel Odyssey,' players take on the role of Cooper, a former NASA pilot turned farmer in a near-future Earth facing a global food crisis. When mysterious gravitational anomalies lead Cooper and his team to a hidden NASA base, they discover a wormhole near Saturn that may hold the key to humanity's survival. Players must navigate through various 2D pixel-art levels, piloting spacecraft, solving physics-based puzzles, and managing resources to explore new worlds on the other side of the wormhole. Along the way, they encounter time dilation effects, alien civilizations, and moral dilemmas as they strive to find a habitable planet for humanity's future. Will players unravel the mysteries of the universe and make the ultimate sacrifice for the greater good?

main_character.name: Cooper
main_character.visual_description: Wearing a worn-out NASA jumpsuit with a patch bearing the NASA logo, Cooper sports a rugged and determined look. His pixelated face shows signs of experience and resilience.

characters.name: Professor Brand
characters.visual_description: Wearing a lab coat with glasses, Professor Brand exudes wisdom and determination.

characters.name: Amelia
characters.visual_description: Donning a practical jumpsuit with tools at her belt, Amelia is ready to fix any spacecraft malfunction.

characters.name: TARS
characters.visual_description: A rectangular robot with rotating limbs, TARS provides witty banter and crucial support in missions.

characters.name: Murph
characters.visual_description: In a simple dress with a determined expression, Murph guides players on significant missions.

characters.name: Dr. Mann
characters.visual_description: Dressed in a scientist's outfit, Dr. Mann's deceptive smile hints at hidden motives.

dialogue.speaker: Professor Brand

dialogue.line: They indicate the presence of a wormhole near Saturn.

dialogue.speaker: Cooper
